subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The sixth-seeded Nets won for the second consecutive time at home to take a 3-1 advantage in the series. They are a game from knocking off the third-seeded Raptors.
snippet: The sixth-seeded Nets won for the second consecutive time at home to take a 3-1 advantage in the series. They are a game from knocking off the third-seeded Raptors.
